Html:
Hi,

I am binding different DataTables dynamically for the DataGrid as the ItemSource. After assigning the ItemSource I want to select(highlight) the last row of the datagrid. Is there any easy way to select the last row of the DataGrid?

Thanks!

Hi,

If you are binding a DataTable you can find its row count from DataTable.Rows.Count, you can then use this to select the last row by setting the DataGrid.SelectedIndex property.

Regards,
